entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:26 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
